description:
The nature of Black’s power remains a mystery, so Whis, Beerus, and Goku go to the 10th Universe to find answers. Will challenging an apprentice Supreme Kai really help with the investigation? Goku seems to think so.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Black no Shoutai o Abake! Iza Dai 10 Uchuu no Kaiou Shinkai e!
Enthülle Blacks wahre Identität! – Auf zur Welt der Kaioshin des zehnten Universums!
Investigando la auténtica identidad de Black. ¡Rumbo al reino del Kaioh Shin del décimo universo!
Uncover Black`s Identity! To the Sacred World of the Kais!
ブラックの正体を暴け! いざ第10宇宙の界王神界へ!
